page.title: 11Faldingworth Village Hall
page.content: The{Village Hall}was built as a hospital at Lincoln in the first world war.Half was brought to{Faldingworth } in sections and was opened on 29th April 1920.The other half is at Top Farm and has been made into a wooden bungalow. The{Village Hall}was made of wood and corrugated iron but in April to June 1985 it was rebuilt. When the builders were rebuilding the hall they found the bed numbers from when the{Village Hall}was a hospital. The{Village Hall}is owned by the Parish Council.It is used for Discos, W.I., Friendship club, Band Practice, Jumble Sales, Youth Club, wedding receptions and parties.
